name: The Road To Sanctuary
description:
The Road to Sanctuary

In a desolate winter landscape, one man travels north. Nuclear winter had brought with it not only the cold, but also creatures that sought to feed on his flesh. Unfortunately, cars are not as reliable as they used to be. With a rattle and a pop, the man is now stranded. He must fend off the horde while he tries to collect parts to fix his car.

Will he be able to continue his journey on the Road to Sanctuary?

Created by Bardent over the course of 30 days for the Ukraine Winter Game Jam.

Made with: Unity and C#

Controls Just In Case:

WASD to move

SHIFT / C to sprint

R / LMB to Reload

LMB to Shoot

RMB to Aim Down Sights

Scroll Wheel / 1,2,3 to Swap Weapons

Spacebar to Interact
